projects.title: The Coffee Brake
projects.description: Some of the features and technologues used in this e-Commerce application are Gatsby.js, a headless node.js CMS called Strapi where all of the data is stored in a PostgreSQL database, and payment processing is handled using Stripe's APIs.
projects.work: This website was designed using Material design principles in mind. To ensure speed and performance, I used Gatsby.js to create a lightning fast front-end. To process payments, I used Stripe's Payment Intent API which allows for safe and speedy transactions.

projects.title: Crown Clothing
projects.description: Some of the features and technologues used in this e-Commerce application are React.js, Firebase for data storage and user authentication, and payment processing using Stripe's API.
projects.work: This website was created using Create-React-App and then further enhanced with a custom Node.js server to handle payments. All the elements are designed using Styled Components. To process payments, I used Stripe's Checkout API, which optimizes conversion rates and safely handles payments on Stripe's servers.
